entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:25 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: -11.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -16.6°C
Wind: NNE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:05 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:05 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
